attributes.action: limit migration and work permits as in Australia and America
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In America jobs which can be done by USA nationals are only available to them in the first instance.
In Australia one has to score points to be allowed in to live & work.  This being part of the British Commonwealth, why are these rules not applied here where we have much less room.  Why are we the dumping ground for all and sundry.
We now have families here from other countries being kept by us whilst their husbands are working back in their original country and the families are sending their benefits back home to their home country.  It stinks.
